metadata.description: Manually enhanced demo data to show context feature

dialogue_lines.speaker: HAN
dialogue_lines.context: Han realizes Luke doesn't know about his feelings for Leia and tries to break the news gently
dialogue_lines.dialogue: Ooops! I guess you haven't told Luke about that yet.
dialogue_lines.dialogue_clean: Ooops! I guess you haven't told Luke about that yet.

dialogue_lines.speaker: HAN
dialogue_lines.context: Han is trying to confess his feelings about Leia to Luke before the dangerous mission
dialogue_lines.movie: Star Wars The Return Of The Jedi

dialogue_lines.speaker: HAN
dialogue_lines.context: Han is surprised to learn Luke came to rescue him in Cloud City, worried about the trap
dialogue_lines.movie: Star Wars The Return Of The Jedi

dialogue_lines.speaker: HAN
dialogue_lines.context: Han is frantically calling for Luke after he falls into the trash compactor

dialogue_lines.speaker: HAN
dialogue_lines.context: Han is trying to reassure Leia that Luke is fine after he went missing on Hoth patrol
dialogue_lines.dialogue: Luke! I'm sure he's fine. Probably sitting around wondering what
dialogue_lines.dialogue_clean: Luke! I'm sure he's fine. Probably sitting around wondering what

dialogue_lines.speaker: HAN
dialogue_lines.context: Han doesn't understand why Vader is asking about Luke during his interrogation
